CustomField.description: This step is all about the technical requirements needed to win the deal.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: --A score of 0 means we don’t know their criteria that they are measuring us against. --A score of 1 means they have shared requirements with us, but haven’t met them all. --A score of 2 means they have mapped out the requirements, and confirmed with us that we can meet them all.
CustomField.label: Decision Criteria Score
